title: Ecuador Homologation Form Required for Pixel 3a to Function Legally... or else it's blocked!
content:
My phone Google Pixel 3a will be blocked in my country Ecuador in the next 30 days because it's not "Homologated".

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jvmRuFiMzos0pD4XXwpOPn0w6OsZM0MKjWYY6x6hFPQ/edit?usp=sharing

After researching the information required for this form to be completed, they are asking for many technical stuff i have no idea how to fill. So far i have filled the Form with all the details, IMEI, serial number, code, label, description, multiple pictures (they even asked for internal components picture that i took a picture off a youtube video they opened a google pixel 3a)

But now i face something i have no idea how to fill. Maybe someone here can fill it for me, or guide me through it. Here, take a look of what's required here:

##########################################
Because copy-paste is not working properly, I'll attached the file hoping for someone to help me complete it. It's in spanish, but the data is the same. The file is uploaded to google drive so anyone with the link can help me complete it.

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jvmRuFiMzos0pD4XXwpOPn0w6OsZM0MKjWYY6x6hFPQ/edit?usp=sharing


If i don't present this in less than 30 days, my phone will be useless in my country Ecuador. Returning it to Google is not possible. Please help me community!
##########################################
